table.name: vtiger_hmrentries
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hmrentries` ( `hmrentriesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `hmr_value` INT(30) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`hmrentriesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_hmrentriescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_hmrentriescf` ( `hmrentriesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`hmrentriesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
